name: Curse of the Paradise Islands
description:
"Curse of the Paradise Islands" is a game where you play as a navigator who has been commissioned by his king to find the Fountain of Youth.

You have the possibility to choose between 3 types: Explorer, Botanist or Soldier.

The Explorer can navigate faster and requires less food than the others.

The Botanist can recognize edible and inedible plants but cannot navigate. A journey will take twice as long and he will always want to explore every places he encounters.

The Soldier has been to many countries and is better able to resist disease.

It's up to you to choose your type of explorer to try and unlock the secrets of Paradise Islands!

You can use the keyboard or a gamepad.

Default keyboard keys: direction arrows to move and Enter to validate.
Default gamepad buttons: left stick to move and A button to validate.

You can configure the keys/buttons in the Options menu.

Framework used: Dina (Love2D)

Images, sounds and tilesets: see credits in-game
